name: Kim Slawson @ Github
body:
A designer and developer proficient in both screen and
print media, Kim espouses simplicity and consistency.
He speaks for the user, whose needs inform the design
and development process from start to finish.

### Designer
Kim excels at optimizing user experience for mobile,
web, and print media. Grids and good typography please!

### Front-end Developer
Kim quickly and accurately iterates from
mockup or vision to finished product, whether in pixels or ink.

### Contact
Kim can be found on twitter [@OxC0FFEE](http://twitter.com/OxC0FFEE) and can be reached by email at [kim@slawson.org](mailto:kim+github@slawson.org)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
